vsParam: Hee hee, we've gotten used to the life in the Academy.

Now that we've figured out when the campus shop puts bread on the
shelves, that makes us Academy old hands.

Yeah, the new students have adapted to the life
here, which reminds me of a year ago...

You're right... Sorel and I are childhood friends, but
I only got to know [px] after entering the Academy.

Right, I miss that so much.
Sorel once hit me hard with a swatter...

C-can't you just get over it?
Anyway that's exactly how we got to know each other!

Hehe, yeah. Speaking of which, what you said is
exactly what those guys said.

Which one do you think is more powerful, magic, or alchemy?
I'll go with magic! We can use it to do many things!

Huh!? It has to be alchemy!
You can use it to make whatever item you like!

Ah, they're arguing.
This argument ended up with no winner last year.

Yeah, but we're second years now.
I think you've had the answer now, [px]?
Magic is more powerful than alchemy, right? ♪

Huh? You still think so?
Let's slug it out now?

You... You scoffed at magic!? Fine!
Let's slug it out now!

There happens to be a powerful monster haunting the neighborhood
of the Academy. Whoever takes it down first wins.

In other words, [px], if you defeat the monster before me,
it shows alchemy is more powerful! Otherwise, it'll be magic!
[px]が先に倒せば、錬金術がすごい！ ←ボイス無し

What do you think?
Isn't it easy to understand?

I see... So, challenge accepted!
Humph, [px] will not lose to you, Sorel.

We'll see!
I should get going!

Gosh...
Here comes this pointless competition again...
